daily_plan_req: Franz Alez opens his Fishing Tackle Shop at 12pm and works at the counter until 6pm. He closes the Fishing Tackle Shop at 6pm and goes fishing by the river until 8pm.
name: Franz Alez
learned: Franz Alez is the owner of a Fishing Tackle Shop who is friendly to others. He is always thinking of ways to go fishing, which brings him great joy.
currently: Franz Alez is planning to host a fishing tournament by the river from 1pm to 3pm on November 12th. To gather people, he is walking around the town from 11am to 12pm, posting flyers and inviting everyone to participate.
lifestyle: Franz Alez goes to bed around 10pm, awakes up around 7pm.
living_area: dokidoki ville:Franz Alez's Fishing Tackle Shop:Master Bedroom
